CustomField.formula: IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Appt_Confirmed_HA__c = TRUE, "HA ","") + IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Appt_Confirmed_SO__c = TRUE, "SO ","") + IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Appt_Confirmed_WA__c = TRUE, "WA ","") + IF( $Setup.Text_Settings_Appt__c.Appt_Confirmed_WI__c = TRUE, "WI ","")
CustomField.label: Text -Appt Confirmed
